org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.manager

Class AbstractLeaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.AbstractDhcpReplyFactory
      • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.manager.AbstractLeaseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LeaseManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDynamicLeaseManager, FixedStoreLeaseManager, LdapStoreLeaseManager, SimpleStoreLeaseManager

    public abstract class AbstractLeaseManager
extends AbstractDhcpReplyFactory
implements LeaseManager
    A base class for lease managers which allocate addresses from a pool.
